scripts.start: bash -c 'clear && npm run dev && npm run dev'
scripts.build:dev: npm run -s lint:dev || echo "[lint] issues (non-blocking)"; SOFT_FAIL=1 LINT_REPORT_PATH=temp/lint-report.json node scripts/build.js && echo "[build] ok"
scripts.dev: bash -c 'set -e; npm run -s build:dev; HOST=${HOST:-127.0.0.1} npm run -s srv & srv_pid=$!; trap "if [ -n \"$srv_pid\" ]; then kill \"$srv_pid\" 2>/dev/null; fi" EXIT; echo "[dev] watching for changes"; nodemon --quiet --on-change-only --exitcrash --legacy-watch --watch content --watch config --watch site-config.json --ignore build --ext md,html,css,js,json,svg --exec "npm run -s build:dev"'
scripts.init: bash -c 'git remote get-url upstream >/dev/null 2>&1 || git remote add upstream https://github.com/jhlagado/scribere.git; git fetch upstream'
scripts.update: bash -c 'git fetch upstream && git merge --no-edit upstream/main'
